attributes.action: enable e-mail contact with all UK citizens and abandon YouTube gimmicks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any attempts to e-mail the Prime Minister are met with a message stating that it is not possible as systems are being re-examined. This message is dated 12 August 2008. Nearly a year ago?!? How are we supposed to communicate?

rejection.details: You can email the PM by visiting: https://email.number10.gov.uk/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
